comment.author: 40038624@N03
comment._content: On several here, the word inauguration is misspelled in the bib record, correct on the negatives.  This is almost certainly the Glynn and Whitman NY gubernatorial succession, documented in additional negatives in the set.

comment._content: Thanks, Carl.  Bib records appear to have been corrected; updates will appear in Flickr anon.
